sentences.en: A long-tailed marsupial mouse, is found only in the Kimberley region of Western Australia. This timid creature rarely ventures for from its nest.
sentences.cn: 一种长尾有袋鼠，只有在西澳洲的金伯利来地区才能见到。这种胆小的动物几乎从不远离自己的巢穴外出冒险。

sentences.en: A University of Muenster team drew up a marsupial family tree based on DNA.
sentences.cn: 明斯特的一所大学的研究小组构建了一株有袋类动物家族的DNA基因树图谱。

sentences.en: Commonly known as the Tasmanian Tiger, the Thylacine was the largest known carnivorous marsupial of modern times.
sentences.cn: 袋狼以塔斯马尼亚虎知名，它是现代社会最知名的食肉有袋动物。

sentences.en: Koala is an arboreal Australian marsupial.
sentences.cn: 考拉是一种澳大利亚树栖有袋动物。

sentences.en: The injured marsupial which underwent surgery at the Melbourne Zoo is expected to recover.
sentences.cn: 接受了墨尔本动物园的外科手术,这个受伤的有袋类动物有望康复.

sentences.en: The smallest marsupial in all the world is but 45mm in length. So small that when fully grown it can stand comfortable in a dessert spoon.
sentences.cn: 全世界最小的有袋动物只不过45毫米，小到待其完全长大时还能够舒舒服服地站到一只点心匙上。

sentences.en: Wallabies are marsupial mammals like kangaroos and eat diets high in vegetation.
sentences.cn: 小袋鼠是像袋鼠一样有袋的哺乳类动物并食用含有大量制备的食物。

trans.tran_en: an animal such as a  kangaroo  which carries its babies in a pocket of skin on its body
an animal such as a  kangaroo  which carries its babies in a pocket of skin on its body
an animal such as a  kangaroo  which carries its babies in a pocket of skin on its body
